title: USHG CEO: Fine Dining is Our Strongest Segment
description: Chip Wade, CEO of Union Square Hospitality Group, discusses trends in the fine-dining sector, highlighting increases in foot traffic and customer spending across the company’s restaurants. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
